article.title: Status and history for [mly_arab]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: ISO 639-3 mly covers a group of languages and has been retired. Switching to the most widely spoken language, zlm, “Malay (Arabic)”.
stage 4: available for review thanks to http://www.geonames.de
